titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MATERNITY COMPLICATING MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS TYPE (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) - Description

body.p: MATERNITY COMPLICATING MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS TYPE (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) is the same as attribute MATERNITY COMPLICATING MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS , for the purpose of the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care .
Relevant MATERNITY COMPLICATING MEDICAL DIAGNOSES may be recorded at any time during the Maternity Episode .
